MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​MoonSharpModuleConstantAttribute
Attribute
[AttributeUsage(AttributeTargets.Field, Inherited = false, AllowMultiple = false)]
public sealed
MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​MoonSharpModuleConstantAttribute

In a module type, mark fields with this attribute to have them exposed as a module constant.  See MoonSharpModuleAttribute for more information about modules.

Properties
Name
public string Name { get; set }

Gets or sets the name of the constant - if different from the name of the field itself
